snippet: In a set of documents unsealed on Tuesday, Ms. Sommer, an event manager, recounted how colleagues encouraged students to open up as many credit cards as possible to pay for classes that many of them could not afford. “It’s O.K., just max out your credit card,” she recalled their saying.
lead_paragraph: In a set of documents unsealed on Tuesday, Ms. Sommer, an event manager, recounted how colleagues encouraged students to open up as many credit cards as possible to pay for classes that many of them could not afford. “It’s O.K., just max out your credit card,” she recalled their saying.

headline.main: Testimony From Corrine Sommer, a Former Employee of Trump University
